import React from "react"; // import reviews from "../data"; import { FaQuoteLeft, FaQuoteRight } from 'react-icons/fa'; import {FiChevronLeft, FiChevronRight} from "react-icons/fi"; const Card = (props) => { let reviews = props.review; return (

{reviews.name}

{reviews.job}

{reviews.text}
) } export default Card
